description:
Versioning when using Git, solved.

Versioning when using Git, solved.
GitVersion looks at your git history and works out the Semantic Version of the commit being built.
As part of this release we had 12 commits which resulted in 5 issues being closed.Documentation
- !4229 Update msbuild.md: Visual Studio is no longer supported
- #4244 [ISSUE]: dotnet tool install docs should not use an explicit --version arg
- !4288 Mention new config parameter semantic-version-format
